result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Wayne Rouillard

records.addlTxt: 10:34 AM Defendant Michael Wayne Rouillard does not appear in Court,  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DA Hatch is requesting a warrant due to non-appearance. Based on failure to appear warrrant is authorized. Court adjourned at 10:35 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 2, 2021 at 10:30 am.

11:04 AM Defendant Michael Wayne Rouillard in court via ZOOM.  Halle E. Hatch appeared via ZOOM for the State of Wisconsin.  Status to determine if defendant has an attorney.  Defendant indicates he has made an attempt to obtain an attorney.  Needs to have his court appointed paperwork notarized.  Should be able to have paperwork notarized by the 9th or 10th of the month and will send it back right away.  Hatch requests be set for preliminary hearing whether or not he has an attorney.  Set out 30 - 45 days.  Off record for scheduling.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 2, 2021 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on July 6, 2021 at 11:00 am.

11:31 AM Defendant Michael Wayne Rouillard appears via Zoom teleconferencing.  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin via Zoom videoconferencing.  Investigator Bauer appears via Zoom videoconferencing.  Set for Preliminary Hearing.  Court questions if Defendant has counsel.  Defendant states he just called the COC office asking for a county-appointed attorney.  DA Hatch request Status set vs. PH to ensure Defendant has counsel.  Court questions Defendant's address and phone.  Adjourned at 11:41 AM  Status conference scheduled for July 6, 2021 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 18, 2021 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 18, 2021 at 11:30 am.
Court finds Defendant freely, intelligently, knowingly, and understandingly made and waives constitutional right to those time requirements.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Michael Wayne Rouillard
Current: PO Box 352, Oglala, SD 57764 United States  (Effective: 04-14-2021)
Prior: PO Box 92, Bay City, WI 54723

NO CONTACT WITH D.T.H. OR RESIDENCE. 
ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.

03:21 PM Defendant Michael Wayne Rouillard appears via videoconferencing from PCJ .  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court confirms Defendant received a copy of Complaint and questions non-appearance in 2015.  Defendant states that he went back to South Dakota.  Court quashes warrant.  Charges and possible penalties read to the Defendant.  Court reads Complaint.  Constitutional rights explained to Defendant.  State requests $500 cash bond.  State gives bond argument, noting age of case and cites Statute.  Also requests conditions of NC w/DTH or residence.  AS. No objections.  Court orders bond as requested and advises of additional standard bond conditions.  Court questions dob, address and phone.  Non-miltary.    Adjourned at 3:40 PM  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 18, 2021 at 11:30 am.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 10:47 Defendant Michael Wayne Rouillard not in court.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. OSullivan requests warrant body only. Court will sign upon presenation.
Def's Summons and Complaint. Original given to the DA's office.
